name: Rescind NOC/Reinstate Status Synchronization
description: Sync IMS status changes to EOX application when Rescind NOC/Reinstate action is performed

background.text: I am logged in as an Underwriter
I have access to IMS system
There is an active EOX application

scenarios.name: Successfully change status to Rescind NOC/Reinstate in IMS

steps.text: I am viewing an application in IMS
I manually change the status to 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
I save the status change
the IMS status should reflect 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
the status change should be confirmed

scenarios.name: Automatic sync from IMS to EOX application

steps.text: IMS status has been changed to 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
the automatic sync process runs
the EOX application status should be updated
the sync should complete successfully

scenarios.name: EOX submission status updates to Bound after sync

steps.text: IMS status is 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
the sync process has completed
I check the EOX application
the Submission status should be 'Bound'
the application status should reflect the IMS change

scenarios.name: AL status updates to Bound when AL is selected

steps.text: the application has AL selected
IMS status is changed to 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
the sync process completes
the AL status should change to 'Bound'
the status change should be visible in EOX

scenarios.name: GL status updates to Bound when GL is selected

steps.text: the application has GL selected
IMS status is changed to 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
the sync process completes
the GL status should change to 'Bound'
the status change should be visible in EOX

scenarios.name: Both AL and GL statuses update when both are selected

steps.text: the application has both AL and GL selected
IMS status is changed to 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
the sync process completes
both AL and GL statuses should change to 'Bound'
all status changes should be reflected in EOX

scenarios.name: Status change fails with insufficient permissions

steps.text: I am logged in as a user without Underwriter permissions
I attempt to change status to 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate' in IMS
I should see an authorization error
the status should not be changed

scenarios.name: Sync fails when IMS system is unavailable

steps.text: IMS status has been changed to 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
the IMS system becomes unavailable
the automatic sync process attempts to run
the sync should fail with connection error
the EOX application status should remain unchanged

scenarios.name: Invalid status value prevents status change

steps.text: I am viewing an application in IMS
I attempt to set an invalid status value
I try to save the change
I should see a validation error
the status should not be updated
IMS status is changed to 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
the corresponding EOX application does not exist
the sync process runs
the sync should fail with application not found error
an error log should be created

scenarios.name: Status change on application with no AL or GL selection

steps.text: the application has neither AL nor GL selected
IMS status is changed to 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
the sync process completes
only the Submission status should change to 'Bound'
no AL or GL status updates should occur
an application with maximum length identifier exists
IMS status is changed to 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
the sync process runs
the sync should complete successfully
the EOX application should be updated correctly

scenarios.name: Concurrent status changes from multiple underwriters

steps.text: multiple underwriters are accessing the same application
they simultaneously attempt to change status to 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
only one status change should be processed
the other attempts should be handled gracefully

scenarios.name: Alternative manual sync trigger when automatic sync fails

steps.text: automatic sync has failed
IMS status is 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
I manually trigger the sync process
the sync should complete successfully
the EOX application should be updated

gherkin_content:
Feature: Rescind NOC/Reinstate Status Synchronization
  Sync IMS status changes to EOX application when Rescind NOC/Reinstate action is performed

  Background:
    Given I am logged in as an Underwriter
    And I have access to IMS system
    And There is an active EOX application

  @smoke @positive
  Scenario: Successfully change status to Rescind NOC/Reinstate in IMS
    Given I am viewing an application in IMS
    When I manually change the status to 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
    And I save the status change
    Then the IMS status should reflect 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
    And the status change should be confirmed

  @smoke @positive
  Scenario: Automatic sync from IMS to EOX application
    Given IMS status has been changed to 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
    When the automatic sync process runs
    Then the EOX application status should be updated
    And the sync should complete successfully

  @positive @integration
  Scenario: EOX submission status updates to Bound after sync
    Given IMS status is 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
    And the sync process has completed
    When I check the EOX application
    Then the Submission status should be 'Bound'
    And the application status should reflect the IMS change

  @positive @conditional
  Scenario: AL status updates to Bound when AL is selected
    Given the application has AL selected
    And IMS status is changed to 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
    When the sync process completes
    Then the AL status should change to 'Bound'
    And the status change should be visible in EOX

  @positive @conditional
  Scenario: GL status updates to Bound when GL is selected
    Given the application has GL selected
    And IMS status is changed to 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
    When the sync process completes
    Then the GL status should change to 'Bound'
    And the status change should be visible in EOX

  @positive @multiple
  Scenario: Both AL and GL statuses update when both are selected
    Given the application has both AL and GL selected
    And IMS status is changed to 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
    When the sync process completes
    Then both AL and GL statuses should change to 'Bound'
    And all status changes should be reflected in EOX

  @negative @authorization
  Scenario: Status change fails with insufficient permissions
    Given I am logged in as a user without Underwriter permissions
    When I attempt to change status to 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate' in IMS
    Then I should see an authorization error
    And the status should not be changed

  @negative @system
  Scenario: Sync fails when IMS system is unavailable
    Given IMS status has been changed to 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
    And the IMS system becomes unavailable
    When the automatic sync process attempts to run
    Then the sync should fail with connection error
    And the EOX application status should remain unchanged

  @negative @validation
  Scenario: Invalid status value prevents status change
    Given I am viewing an application in IMS
    When I attempt to set an invalid status value
    And I try to save the change
    Then I should see a validation error
    And the status should not be updated

  @negative @data
  Scenario: Sync with non-existent EOX application
    Given IMS status is changed to 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
    And the corresponding EOX application does not exist
    When the sync process runs
    Then the sync should fail with application not found error
    And an error log should be created

  @edge-case @minimal
  Scenario: Status change on application with no AL or GL selection
    Given the application has neither AL nor GL selected
    And IMS status is changed to 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
    When the sync process completes
    Then only the Submission status should change to 'Bound'
    And no AL or GL status updates should occur

  @edge-case @boundary
  Scenario: Maximum length application identifier handling
    Given an application with maximum length identifier exists
    And IMS status is changed to 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
    When the sync process runs
    Then the sync should complete successfully
    And the EOX application should be updated correctly

  @edge-case @concurrency
  Scenario: Concurrent status changes from multiple underwriters
    Given multiple underwriters are accessing the same application
    When they simultaneously attempt to change status to 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
    Then only one status change should be processed
    And the other attempts should be handled gracefully

  @alternative @manual
  Scenario: Alternative manual sync trigger when automatic sync fails
    Given automatic sync has failed
    And IMS status is 'Rescind NOC/Reinstate'
    When I manually trigger the sync process
    Then the sync should complete successfully
    And the EOX application should be updated
